features: Easily attaches to any furnace or air conditioner filter
body.description: Product Description WEB FilterFresh Whole Home Gardenia Air Freshener From the Manufacturer WEB FilterFresh whole home air freshener attaches to any furnace or air conditioner filter. The secret to a pleasant smelling house! As the central furnace/AC system runs a gardenia flower scent fills your home. Great for parties, open houses, holidays and to help reduce lingering household odors like smoke, kitchen, bathroom and pet odors. Safer than candles and FilterFresh lasts longer than aerosol sprays. Scents last for days depending on the size of your home and how much the system is running.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #66,383 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #318 in Air Freshener Sprays

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose WEB's Filter Fresh Whole Home Air Fresheners? Pads attach easily to any furnace/AC filter!Delivers whole home fragrance!Eliminates unwanted odors!Available in a variety of scents! Filter Fresh air fresheners can also be used to provide scent to individual spaces such as cars, bathrooms, and closets.

How to install Remove and discard protective card from Filter Fresh gel pad. Remove airflow cut-out from backside and discard cut-out inserts. Attach to filter on furnace or air conditioner as seen in the image with the enclosed 'S' hook. The fragrance gel side should be facing outward. IMPORTANT : The filter should be installed in the unit so that airflow air flow hits the fragrance gel side first and then the air filter after.

Country Berries Cinnamon Country Cotton Lavender Tropical Bay French Vanilla Treat yourself and your guests to the alluring fragrence of freshly picked berries from the country side. Bring the sweet and spicy fragrence of fall and winter to your home or office with the smell of fresh baked cinnamon rolls. Give your entire home the clean and cozy scent of freshly washed laundry, it's the perfect way to make a home feel inviting. Uplift your spirits with the calm and tranquil aroma of fresh picked lavender. Have an at home beach day with the refreshing scent of tropical fruits such as pineapple and coconut. Create a sweet and soothing environment for your office with the subtle french vanilla scent.

About WEB Products WEB Products Inc., manufactures a full line of furnace filters, air conditioning filters, air filters, allergy filters, and air filter accessories. We began in 1989 with high efficiency filters, and have since expanded into air conditioning filters, replacement furnace filters, virus killing air filters and filters designed specifically to reduce allergens. Scented air filtration pads are also now available. Our goal is to provide consumers with high quality filters, and filter accessories while delivering excellent customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the fragrance, not over powering but yet strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't even consider!
reviews.reviewText: So disappointed! Fresh out of the package this product was so fragrance full I was excited to begin using it. However after installation there was absolutely no scent that permeated through the house. It was as if it was not even installed. Double check the installation, directions and verified the scent strength but the result was the same. NOTHING! NO SCENT! It was a waste of money and a waste of time. Sticking with wall fragrances that has proven to be tried and true. Expensive mistake that won't happen again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and smells good
reviews.reviewText: It smelled very strong the first few hours I installed it. After a day now I only smell it when ac is pumping. It’s light and doesn’t get you feel gross. The house is about 1600 sq ft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This Particular Scent Stunk.
reviews.reviewText: I have never purchased on of these before (in case Amazon is lumping things together, it's a WEB FilterFresh Whole Home Air Freshener, for your air handler/furnace), but I was familiar with them because I used to sell them at a retailer I worked at. I have been having problems with odor in my house, so I thought I would give one a try. I found this particular scent, Ocean Mist, and it was priced on Amazon for only .40 cents! What a great price in order to try the product out! When I got it, there is a date on the outside, which was 4 months ago, and it doesn't say if it's an expiration date or a manufacture date, but if it's an expiration date, that would explain why it was marked down.When I got it, I thought it stuck to the bottom of the filter in the air handler with a double sided tape or something, but it turns out, it actually dangles from a supplied "S" hook.One side of it has a VERY cheap and brittle pressed paper board backing, which you have to punch out slots that allow for air flow. It was hard to get out, and came off in small pieces, which was a pain in the neck, pulling at these little pieces of the paper. After getting them off, I hung it from the bottom of my filter, and that is when I discovered that with my particular air handler, I couldn't attach it and then put it in the air handler, because my filter slides in at the bottom of my air handler very tightly, and there is no space for it to "dangle" when putting the filter in. So in order to put in on, I had to go in through my air return, which fortunately, in my situation, it is large and easy to reach in, after taking out all the screws.So on to the scent. In my opinion, this scent STUNK. I removed it and hopefully the smell will dissipate soon, because it stinks, in my opinion! It does have a "scratch and sniff" thing on the front of the package, but that doesn't help me when I'm ordering it through Amazon.So, I rated this 3 stars based on the fact that it is made with the cheap paper backing that easily tears into pieces when it is being removed, the difficulty I had, in my situation, with installing it, and the fact that it smells so bad. I would consider buying this product again in a different scent, buy I would be hesitant, since I disliked this scent so much.This was Made in the U.S.A. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The scent lasts just a few days but is very noticeable those few days. It smelled nothing like its intended scent, but did smell good. I think it could have come with something more secure to keep it on the filter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don’t last long
reviews.reviewText: It smelled great when it worked only last a few days and my heat was only set on 67 so it didn’t go on that much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My whole home literally smells like a gardenia bush in full bloom. Smells absolutely amazing. I have dogs, so smelling gardenias is a nice change of pace from smelling dogs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Simple to install. It takes about 1 minute. The first time the circulation fan came on, the entire house smelled like fresh linen. What a great invention. I've already ordered another for when this one fades. I understand the claims of it not lasting long because it is super strong on day one. It drops of pretty quick to a light freshness. I can still smell it 3 weeks later. I is in a smoke free, pet free, kid free home so there are no other smells to compete with.
The smell is amazing u can even smell it outside my car. Going to buy more for the house now, planning on putting them on my vents to give the whole house this awesome smell
Easy installation, the house had a nice scentFirst day scent is strong. The product needs time to distribute and settle scent. I would buy again
